title: The Life Aquatic Adventure No. 12: The Jaguar Shark (Part 1)
description: Steve Zissou and crew take the Belafonte to Oubyamywe Peninsula, a remote and fascinating region teeming with extraordinary marine life.
parent: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
altHero: Steve Zissou in scuba gear in front of a school of brightly colored pink fish
alt2: Vikram Ray underwater in scuba gear
alt3: Zissou kisses the bald head of Esteban du Plantier
alt4: Zissou’s traumatized face, his eyes wide with unnatural coloring and rings
